TopicTitle: Double Treat! A Craft that should have crashed and a new song!

Articles.Content:
It's been a while so I wanted to do something...for Bill. Also a rocket sled liftoff! I really expected this to crash horribly!

And...well...I was acting dumb on camera...so yeah hahahahaha

The song is called "Bill's Training Day"

It is available without the video here: https://soundcloud.com/billy-winn-2/bills-training-day

Hope you enjoy the track and drop a comment and let me know what you think!

Edited August 31, 2014 by Jatwaa
